description.value:
Fire, Radiant

Aura 2

Each enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 20 fire and radiant damage and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Radiant

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 1d8+13 damage plus 2d8 fire and radiant damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 2d8+13 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Radiant, Teleportation

Standard

Ranged 20

+35 vs Reflex; 2d8+13 fire and radiant damage, and Valamaradace teleports the target 4 squares .

At-Will

Free

Trigger: When an enemy starts its turn within 5 squares of valamaradace, at-will

Valamaradace uses golden light against the triggering enemy

At-Will

Standard

Valamaradace makes two golden light attacks

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire, Radiant

Standard

Close blast 7

+35 vs Reflex; 4d10+13 fire and radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Valamaradace uses it

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire, Radiant

Minor, Recharge

Ranged 20

+35 vs Fortitude; the target gains vulnerable 20 fire and vulnerable 20 radiant (save ends).

Encounter

Minor

Until the end of Valamaradace's next turn, any creature that takes radiant damage from her attacks is dazed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Polymorph

Minor

Valamaradace can alter her physical form to take on the appearance of any Large or smaller humanoid or beast (see "Change Shape," MM2 216).

Alignment Unaligned

Passive Perception 32 | Insight 32
